item.title: Migrating from Jekyll to Hugo
item.description: This post contains information about the migration of my Github development-cheat-sheets page (this site) from Jekyll.

item.title: My First Hugo Post
item.description: Welcome Hello world, this is my first Hugo blog post. I hope you like it!

item.title: Hugo
item.description: Hugo is a very fast Static Site Generator (SSG) built with Go.

item.title: MarkDown
item.description: Markdown is a lightweight markup language with plain-text-formatting syntax. Its design allows it to be converted to many output formats.

item.title: Modules
item.description: This page provides examples of how to use Hugo modules.

item.description: This page provides examples of how to use the Hugo page syntax.
